metadata.title: CVE-2019-17545 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: GDAL through 3.0.1 has a poolDestroy double free in OGRExpatRealloc in ogr/ogr_expat.cpp when the 10MB threshold is exceeded. It was discovered that GDAL incorrectly handled memory allocation. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: gdal package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.2+dfsg-2').
